name: @saekitominaga/htmlformelement-submit-overlay
description: Cover the entire screen with an overlay when form submitting.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormSubmitOverlay.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormSubmitOverlay.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormSubmitOverlay.js -- terser dist/FormSubmitOverlay.js -o dist/FormSubmitOverlay.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/FormSubmitOverlay.js.map',filename='FormSubmitOverlay.js',includeSources,url='FormSubmitOverlay.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormSubmitOverlay.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormSubmitOverlay.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormSubmitOverlay.d.ts -- cpy dist/FormSubmitOverlay.d.ts dist --rename=FormSubmitOverlay.min.d.ts
